member.name: WICJpegScanType
member.summary: Specifies the memory layout of pixel data in a JPEG image scan.

member.name: WICJpegScanType.WICJpegScanTypeInterleaved
member.summary: The pixel data is stored in an interleaved memory layout.

member.name: WICJpegScanType.WICJpegScanTypePlanarComponents
member.summary: The pixel data is stored in a planar memory layout.

member.name: WICJpegScanType.WICJpegScanTypeProgressive
member.summary: The pixel data is stored in a progressive layout.

member.name: WICJpegScanType.WICJpegScanType_FORCE_DWORD
member.summary: Forces this enumeration to compile to 32 bits in size. Without this value, some compilers would allow this enumeration to compile to a size other than 32 bits. This value is not used.
